projects.description: Welcome to G.O.A.T., the website about the best at their sport. The intention of G.O.A.T. is to have a kind of virtual museum with the achivments, photos and videos of the best of the best.
Welcome to the Bee Hive. This was an hackaton project, meant to bring awareness to the importance of the bees to the ecosystem, and to promote the type of goods they produce.

The Epico gamers is an app designed for board games lovers. Here you may find info about different board games and the best places in the world to buy them and to play them in good company. Throught the world map you can find stores and coffee shops across the world!
